events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of April 30th, resulting in significant damage to the front bumper and windshield.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial incident description and associated keywords.
An insurance agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to manage the claim and contact the customer for further details.
The claim submission has been acknowledged, and the customer received confirmation along with the next steps for documentation.
Customer has been asked to provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including detailed photos from various angles and an official accident report from the authorities.
The investigation team has started reviewing the submitted evidence and verifying details related to the reported vehicle collision.
Investigation concluded that the accident was caused by an unavoidable obstruction, with no liability concerns attributed to the insured driver.
A settlement proposal covering the full estimated repair costs has been prepared and sent to the customer for approval.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the timely handling of the claim and the settlement offer, confirming willingness to proceed.
The claim has been officially approved by the claims committee following customer agreement on the proposed settlement.
Payment corresponding to the repair expenses has been issued to the customerâ€™s bank account as per the agreed settlement.
After successful payment issuance and receipt confirmation, the claim is now officially closed with no pending actions.
